00048 /* Settings ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00049 /** @defgroup USBDCore_Settings USB Device Core settings
00050   * @{
00051   */
00052 /* USBD Debug mode                                                                                          */
00053 //<e0.0> Enable USB Debug mode
00054 //<o1.0> Dump USB Debug data
00055 #ifndef USBDCORE_DEBUG
00056   #define USBDCORE_DEBUG                  (0)       /*!< Enable USB Debug mode                              */
00057   #define USBDCORE_DEBUG_DATA             (0)       /*!< Dump USB Debug data                                */
00058 #endif
00059 /**
00060   * @}
00061   */
00062 
00063 /* Exported types ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00064 /** @defgroup USBDCore_Exported_Type USB Device Core exported types
00065   * @{
00066   */
00067 /**
00068  * @brief USB Device Request.
00069  */
00070 typedef __PACKED_H struct
00071 {
00072   uc8 bmRequestType;
00073   uc8 bRequest;
00074   uc8 wValueL;
00075   uc8 wValueH;
00076   uc16 wIndex;
00077   uc16 wLength;
00078 } __PACKED_F USBDCore_Request_TypeDef;
00079 
00080 /**
00081  * @brief USB Descriptor.
00082  */
00083 typedef struct
00084 {
00085   uc8 *pDeviceDesc;                                 /*!< Device Descriptor                                  */
00086   uc8 *pConfnDesc;                                  /*!< Configuration Descriptor                           */
00087   uc8 **ppStringDesc;                               /*!< String Descriptor                                  */
00088   u32 uStringDescNumber;                            /*!< Count of String Descriptor                         */
00089 } USBDCore_Desc_TypeDef;
00090 
00091 /**
00092  * @brief STALL, control IN or control OUT.
00093  */
00094 typedef enum
00095 {
00096   USB_ACTION_STALL   = 0,
00097   USB_ACTION_DATAIN  = 1,
00098   USB_ACTION_DATAOUT = 2,
00099 } USBDCore_Action_Enum;
00100 
00101 /**
00102  * @brief Call back function.
00103  */
00104 typedef struct
00105 {
00106   void (*func)  (u32 uPara);                        /*!< Call back function pointer                         */
00107   u32 uPara;                                        /*!< Parameter of call back function                    */
00108 } USBDCore_CallBack_TypeDef;
00109 
00110 /**
00111  * @brief Parameter for control IN/OUT Transfer.
00112  */
00113 typedef struct
00114 {
00115   u8 uBuffer[2];                                    /*!< Temporary buffer                                   */
00116   uc8 *pData;                                       /*!< Pointer of control IN/OUT Data                     */
00117   s32 sByteLength;                                  /*!< Total length for control IN/OUT Transfer           */
00118   USBDCore_Action_Enum Action;                      /*!< STALL, control IN or control OUT                   */
00119   USBDCore_CallBack_TypeDef CallBack_OUT;           /*!< Call back function pointer for Control OUT         */
00120 } USBDCore_Transfer_TypeDef;
00121 
00122 /**
00123  * @brief USB Device.
00124  */
00125 typedef struct
00126 {
00127   USBDCore_Request_TypeDef  Request;                /*!< USB Device Request                                 */
00128   USBDCore_Desc_TypeDef     Desc;                   /*!< USB Descriptor                                     */
00129   USBDCore_Transfer_TypeDef Transfer;               /*!< Parameter for control IN/OUT Transfer              */
00130 } USBDCore_Device_TypeDef;
00131 
00132 /**
00133  * @brief Bit access for CurrentFeature.
00134  */
00135 typedef __PACKED_H struct _FEATURE_TYPEBIT
00136 {
00137   unsigned bSelfPowered  :1;                        /*!< Remote Wakeup feature                              */
00138   unsigned bRemoteWakeup :1;                        /*!< Self Powered                                       */
00139 } __PACKED_F USBDCore_Feature_TypeBit;
00140 
00141 /**
00142  * @brief For Set/ClearFeature and GetStatus request.
00143  */
00144 typedef __PACKED_H union _FEATURE_TYPEDEF
00145 {
00146   u8 uByte;                                         /*!< Byte access for CurrentFeature                     */
00147   USBDCore_Feature_TypeBit Bits;                    /*!< Bit access for CurrentFeature                      */
00148 } __PACKED_F USBDCore_Feature_TypeDef;
00149 
00150 /**
00151  * @brief Device State.
00152  */
00153 typedef enum
00154 {
00155   USB_STATE_UNCONNECTED   = 0,
00156   USB_STATE_ATTACHED      = 1,
00157   USB_STATE_POWERED       = 2,
00158   USB_STATE_SUSPENDED     = 3,
00159   USB_STATE_DEFAULT       = 4,
00160   USB_STATE_ADDRESS       = 5,
00161   USB_STATE_CONFIGURED    = 6,
00162 } USBDCore_Status_Enum;
00163 
00164 /**
00165  * @brief USB Device information.
00166  */
00167 typedef struct
00168 {
00169   u8 uCurrentConfiguration;                         /*!< For Set/GetConfiguration request                   */
00170   u8 uCurrentInterface;                             /*!< For Set/GetInterface request                       */
00171   volatile USBDCore_Status_Enum CurrentStatus;      /*!< Device State                                       */
00172   USBDCore_Status_Enum LastStatus;                  /*!< Device State before SUSPEND                        */
00173   USBDCore_Feature_TypeDef CurrentFeature;          /*!< For Set/ClearFeature and GetStatus request         */
00174   u32 uIsDiscardClearFeature;                       /*!< Discard ClearFeature flag for Mass Storage         */
00175 } USBDCore_Info_TypeDef;
00176 
00177 typedef void (*USBDCore_CallBackClass_Typedef)  (USBDCore_Device_TypeDef *pDev);
00178 typedef void (*USBDCore_CallBackVendor_Typedef) (USBDCore_Device_TypeDef *pDev);
00179 typedef void (*USBDCore_CallBackEPTn_Typedef)   (USBD_EPTn_Enum EPTn);
00180 
00181 /**
00182  * @brief USB Class call back function.
00183  */
00184 typedef struct
00185 {
00186   USBDCore_CallBack_TypeDef      CallBack_MainRoutine;        /*!< Class main routine call back function    */
00187   USBDCore_CallBack_TypeDef      CallBack_Reset;              /*!< Class RESET call back function           */
00188   USBDCore_CallBack_TypeDef      CallBack_StartOfFrame;       /*!< Class SOF call back function             */
00189   USBDCore_CallBackClass_Typedef CallBack_ClassGetDescriptor; /*!< Class Get Descriptor call back function  */
00190   USBDCore_CallBackClass_Typedef CallBack_ClassSetInterface;  /*!< Set Interface call back function         */
00191   USBDCore_CallBackClass_Typedef CallBack_ClassGetInterface;  /*!< Get Interface call back function         */
00192   USBDCore_CallBackClass_Typedef CallBack_ClassRequest;       /*!< Class Request call back function         */
00193   USBDCore_CallBackVendor_Typedef CallBack_VendorRequest;     /*!< Vendor Request call back function        */
00194   USBDCore_CallBackEPTn_Typedef  CallBack_EPTn[MAX_EP_NUM];   /*!< Endpoint n call back function            */
00195 } USBDCore_Class_TypeDef;
00196 
00197 /**
00198  * @brief USB Device Power related call back function.
00199  */
00200 typedef struct
00201 {
00202   USBDCore_CallBack_TypeDef      CallBack_Suspend;
00203 } USBDCore_Power_TypeDef;
00204 
00205 /**
00206  * @brief Major structure of USB Library.
00207  */
00208 typedef struct
00209 {
00210   USBDCore_Device_TypeDef   Device;       /*!< USB Device                                                   */
00211   USBDCore_Info_TypeDef     Info;         /*!< USB Device information                                       */
00212   USBDCore_Class_TypeDef    Class;        /*!< USB Class call back function                                 */
00213   u32                       *pDriver;     /*!< USB Device Driver initialization structure                   */
00214   USBDCore_Power_TypeDef    Power;        /*!< USB Device Power related call back function                  */
00215 } USBDCore_TypeDef;
00216 
00217 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00218 /* Variable architecture of USB Library                                                                     */
00219 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00220 /* USBCore - USBDCore_TypeDef                                   Major structure of USB Library              */
00221 /*   USBCore.Device - USBDCore_Device_TypeDef                   USB Device                                  */
00222 /*     USBCore.Device.Request - USBDCore_Request_TypeDef        USB Device Request                          */
00223 /*       USBCore.Device.Request.bmRequestType                                                               */
00224 /*       USBCore.Device.Request.bRequest                                                                    */
00225 /*       USBCore.Device.Request.wValueL                                                                     */
00226 /*       USBCore.Device.Request.wValueH                                                                     */
00227 /*       USBCore.Device.Request.wIndex                                                                      */
00228 /*       USBCore.Device.Request.wLength                                                                     */
00229 /*     USBCore.Device.Desc - USBDCore_Desc_TypeDef              USB Descriptor                              */
00230 /*       USBCore.Device.Desc.pDeviceDesc                        Device Descriptor                           */
00231 /*       USBCore.Device.Desc.pConfnDesc                         Configuration Descriptor                    */
00232 /*       USBCore.Device.Desc.pStringDesc[DESC_NUM_STRING]       String Descriptor                           */
00233 /*       USBCore.Device.Desc.uStringDescNumber                  Count of String Descriptor                  */
00234 /*     USBCore.Device.Transfer - USBDCore_Transfer_TypeDef      Parameter for control IN/OUT Transfer       */
00235 /*       USBCore.Device.Transfer.uBuffer[2]                     Temporary buffer                            */
00236 /*       USBCore.Device.Transfer.pData                          Pointer of control IN/OUT Data              */
00237 /*       USBCore.Device.Transfer.sByteLength                    Total length for control IN/OUT Transfer    */
00238 /*       USBCore.Device.Transfer.Action - USBDCore_Action_Enum  STALL, control IN or control OUT            */
00239 /*       USBCore.Device.Transfer.CallBack_OUT.func(uPara)       Call back function pointer for Control OUT  */
00240 /*       USBCore.Device.Transfer.CallBack_OUT.uPara             Parameter of Control OUT call back function */
00241 /*                                                                                                          */
00242 /*   USBCore.Info - USBDCore_Info_TypeDef                       USB Device information                      */
00243 /*     USBCore.Info.uCurrentConfiguration                       For Set/GetConfiguration request            */
00244 /*     USBCore.Info.uCurrentInterface                           For Set/GetInterface request                */
00245 /*     USBCore.Info.CurrentStatus - USBDCore_Status_Enum        Device State                                */
00246 /*     USBCore.Info.LastStatus - USBDCore_Status_Enum           Device State before SUSPEND                 */
00247 /*     USBCore.Info.CurrentFeature - USBDCore_Feature_TypeDef   For Set/ClearFeature and GetStatus request  */
00248 /*       USBCore.Info.CurrentFeature.uByte                      Byte access for CurrentFeature              */
00249 /*       USBCore.Info.CurrentFeature.Bits.bRemoteWakeup         Remote Wakeup feature                       */
00250 /*       USBCore.Info.CurrentFeature.Bits.bSelfPowered          Self Powered                                */
00251 /*     USBCore.Info.uIsDiscardClearFeature                      Discard ClearFeature flag for Mass Storage  */
00252 /*                                                                                                          */
00253 /*   USBCore.Class - USBDCore_Class_TypeDef                     USB Class call back function                */
00254 /*     USBCore.Class.CallBack_MainRoutine.func(uPara)           Class main routine call back function       */
00255 /*     USBCore.Class.CallBack_MainRoutine.uPara                 Parameter of class main routine             */
00256 /*     USBCore.Class.CallBack_Reset.func(uPara)                 Class RESET call back function              */
00257 /*     USBCore.Class.CallBack_Reset.uPara                       Parameter of RESET call back function       */
00258 /*     USBCore.Class.CallBack_StartOfFrame.func(uPara)          Class SOF call back function                */
00259 /*     USBCore.Class.CallBack_StartOfFrame.uPara                Parameter of SOF call back function         */
00260 /*     USBCore.Class.CallBack_ClassGetDescriptor(pDev)          Class Get Descriptor call back function     */
00261 /*     USBCore.Class.CallBack_ClassSetInterface(pDev)           Set Interface call back function            */
00262 /*     USBCore.Class.CallBack_ClassGetInterface(pDev)           Get Interface call back function            */
00263 /*     USBCore.Class.CallBack_ClassRequest(pDev)                Class Request call back function            */
00264 /*     USBCore.Class.CallBack_EPTn[MAX_EP_NUM](EPTn)            Endpoint n call back function               */
00265 /*                                                                                                          */
00266 /*   USBCore.pDriver                                            USB Device Driver initialization structure  */
00267 /*                                                                                                          */
00268 /*   USBCore.Power - USBDCore_Power_TypeDef                     USB Device Power related call back function */
00269 /*     USBCore.Power.CallBack_Suspend.func(uPara)               System low power function for SUSPEND       */
00270 /*     USBCore.Power.CallBack_Suspend.uPara                     Parameter of system low power function      */
00271 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00272 
00273 /**
00274   * @}
00275   */
00276 
00277 /* Exported constants --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00278 /** @defgroup USBDCore_Exported_Constant USB Device Core exported constants
00279   * @{
00280   */
00281 
00282 /** @defgroup USBDCore_Descriptor Definitions for USB descriptor
00283   * @{
00284   */
00285 #define DESC_TYPE_01_DEV                  (0x1)
00286 #define DESC_TYPE_02_CONFN                (0x2)
00287 #define DESC_TYPE_03_STR                  (0x3)
00288 #define DESC_TYPE_04_INF                  (0x4)
00289 #define DESC_TYPE_05_EPT                  (0x5)
00290 #define DESC_TYPE_06_DEV_QLF              (0x6)
00291 #define DESC_TYPE_08_INF_PWR              (0x8)
00292 
00293 #define DESC_CLASS_00_BY_INF              (0x00)
00294 #define DESC_CLASS_01_AUDIO               (0x01)
00295 #define DESC_CLASS_02_CDC_CTRL            (0x02)
00296 #define DESC_CLASS_03_HID                 (0x03)
00297 #define DESC_CLASS_05_PHY                 (0x05)
00298 #define DESC_CLASS_06_STILL_IMG           (0x06)
00299 #define DESC_CLASS_07_PRINTER             (0x07)
00300 #define DESC_CLASS_08_MASS_STORAGE        (0x08)
00301 #define DESC_CLASS_09_HUB                 (0x09)
00302 #define DESC_CLASS_0A_CDC_DATA            (0x0A)
00303 #define DESC_CLASS_0B_SMART_CARD          (0x0B)
00304 #define DESC_CLASS_0E_VIDEO               (0x0E)
00305 #define DESC_CLASS_0F_PHD                 (0x0F)
00306 #define DESC_CLASS_FF_VENDOR              (0xFF)
00307 
00308 #define DESC_LEN_DEV                      ((u32)(18))
00309 #define DESC_LEN_CONFN                    ((u32)(9))
00310 #define DESC_LEN_INF                      ((u32)(9))
00311 #define DESC_LEN_EPT                      ((u32)(7))
00312 /**
00313   * @}
00314   */
00315 
00316 /** @defgroup USBDCore_Request Definitions for USB Request
00317   * @{
00318   */
00319 #define REQ_DIR_00_H2D                    (0 << 7)
00320 #define REQ_DIR_01_D2H                    (1 << 7)
00321 
00322 #define REQ_TYPE_00_STD                   (0 << 5)
00323 #define REQ_TYPE_01_CLS                   (1 << 5)
00324 #define REQ_TYPE_02_VND                   (2 << 5)
00325 
00326 #define REQ_REC_00_DEV                    (0)
00327 #define REQ_REC_01_INF                    (1)
00328 #define REQ_REC_02_EPT                    (2)
00329 /**
00330   * @}
00331   */
00332 
00333 /**
00334  * @brief For USBDCore_EPTReadOUTData function.
00335  */
00336 #define USB_DISCARD_OUT_DATA              (0)
00337

00339   * @}
00340   */

00342 /* Exported macro ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00343 /** @defgroup USBDCore_Exported_Macro USB Device Core exported macros
00344   * @{
00345   */
00346 #define __DBG_USBPrintf(...)
00347 #define __DBG_USBDump(a, b)
00348 
00349 #if (USBDCORE_DEBUG == 1)
00350   #ifndef RETARGET_IS_USB
00351     extern u32 __DBG_USBCount;
00352     #undef __DBG_USBPrintf
00353     #define __DBG_USBPrintf printf
00354     #if (USBDCORE_DEBUG_DATA == 1)
00355       #undef __DBG_USBDump
00356       void __DBG_USBDump(uc8 *memory, u32 len);
00357     #endif
00358   #endif
00359 #endif
00360 
00361 /**
00362  * @brief Convert Half-Word to Byte for descriptor.
00363  */
00364 #define DESC_H2B(Val)                     ((u8)(Val & 0x00FF)), ((u8)((Val & 0xFF00) >> 8))
00365 
00366 /**
00367  * @brief Padding 0 automatically for String descriptor.
00368  */
00369 #define DESC_CHAR(c)                      (c), (0)
00370 
00371 /**
00372  * @brief Calculate String length for String descriptor.
00373  */
00374 #define DESC_STRLEN(n)                    (n * 2 + 2)
00375 
00376 /**
00377  * @brief Calculate power for Configuration descriptor.
00378  */
00379 #define DESC_POWER(mA)                    (mA / 2)
00380 /**
00381   * @}
00382   */

00385 /** @defgroup USBDCore_Exported_Functions USB Device Core exported functions
00386   * @{
00387   */
00388 #define USBDCore_DeInit                 API_USB_DEINIT
00389 #define USBDCore_EPTReset               API_USB_EPTn_RESET
00390 #define USBDCore_EPTGetBufferLen        API_USB_EPTn_GET_BUFFLEN
00391 #define USBDCore_EPTGetTransferCount    API_USB_EPTn_GET_CNT
00392 #define USBDCore_EPTSetSTALL            API_USB_EPTn_SET_HALT
00393 #define USBDCore_EPTWaitSTALLSent       API_USB_EPTn_WAIT_STALL_SENT
00394 #define USBDCore_EPTClearDataToggle     API_USB_EPTn_CLR_DTG
00395 
00396 #define USBDCore_EPTWriteINData         API_USB_EPTn_WRITE_IN
00397 #define USBDCore_EPTReadOUTData         API_USB_EPTn_READ_OUT
00398 #define USBDCore_EPTReadMemory          API_USB_EPTn_READ_MEM
00399 
00400 void USBDCore_Init(USBDCore_TypeDef *pCore);
00401 void USBDCore_IRQHandler(USBDCore_TypeDef *pCore);
00402 void USBDCore_MainRoutine(USBDCore_TypeDef *pCore);
00403 u32  USBDCore_IsSuspend(USBDCore_TypeDef *pCore);
00404 u32  USBDCore_GetRemoteWakeUpFeature(USBDCore_TypeDef *pCore);
00405 void USBDCore_TriggerRemoteWakeup(void);
00406 USBDCore_Status_Enum USBDCore_GetStatus(void);
00407 
00408 void USBDCore_EPTReset(USBD_EPTn_Enum USBD_EPTn);
00409 u32  USBDCore_EPTGetBufferLen(USBD_EPTn_Enum USBD_EPTn);
00410 u32  USBDCore_EPTGetTransferCount(USBD_EPTn_Enum USBD_EPTn, USBD_TCR_Enum type);
00411 void USBDCore_EPTSetSTALL(USBD_EPTn_Enum USBD_EPTn);
00412 void USBDCore_EPTWaitSTALLSent(USBD_EPTn_Enum USBD_EPTn);
00413 void USBDCore_EPTClearDataToggle(USBD_EPTn_Enum USBD_EPTn);
00414 
00415 u32  USBDCore_EPTWriteINData(USBD_EPTn_Enum USBD_EPTn, u32 *pFrom, u32 len);

00417 u32  USBDCore_EPTReadMemory(USBD_EPTn_Enum USBD_EPTn, u32 *pTo, u32 len);
